entity_type_definitions.Person: Individual human beings, including historical figures, CEOs, scientists, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Organization: Companies, institutions, universities, departments, labs, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Location: Geographic places including cities, countries, states, regions, landmarks, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Facility: Man-made structures and buildings like towers, monuments, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Event: Significant occurrences or happenings like pandemics, fairs, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Process: Natural or artificial processes like photosynthesis, machine learning, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Technology: Technical systems, computing concepts, software, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Organism: Living things including plants, animals, microorganisms, etc.
entity_type_definitions.System: Complex interconnected systems like the Internet, blockchain, etc.
entity_type_definitions.Service: Products or services offered by companies

common_errors.parks_and_landmarks: Often misclassified as Organization instead of Location or Facility
common_errors.companies: Should be Organization, not Technology or Service
